points.point: A computer science stream will prepare you for in-demand jobs today and it provides one of the highest salaried jobs

points.point: Commerce sector is expanding daily with new work prospects flooding the market and employment rates rising globally.
Commerce students have multiple career options such as MBA, MCom, MCA, CS, CA, CMA, etc.
Commerce field offers various well-paid career options for students and has seen an increase in demands for various job positions.
The Commerce stream is the best stream after the 10th class in marketing, finance, accounting, banking, and management field.

Commerce.compulsory: Economics, Business Studies, English and Accountancy
Commerce.optional: Information Practice, Mathematics,Entrepreneurship, Psychology,Computer Science, Fine Arts,Physical Education etc.

points.point: A humanities major often prepares you to pursue roles that require an understanding of people, creativity, communication, planning.

The courses in humanities help to improve the professional and analytical skills of students in writing, analysis, and reading skills.
Humanities students have multiple career options such as LAW, Journalism, Public relations, Advertising etc.

Humanities.compulsory: History, Geography, Sociology,Political Science and English
